code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'./Transfers.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Transfers=()=>{const[transfers,setTransfers]=useState([]);const[newTransfer,setNewTransfer]=useState({asset:'',quantity:0,fromBase:'',toBase:''});useEffect(()=>{fetchTransfers();},[]);const fetchTransfers=async()=>{const res=await axios.get('/api/transfers');setTransfers(res.data);};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await axios.post('/api/transfers',newTransfer);fetchTransfers();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"transfers-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Transfers"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Asset ID",value:newTransfer.asset,onChange:e=>setNewTransfer({...newTransfer,asset:e.target.value}),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Quantity",type:"number",value:newTransfer.quantity,onChange:e=>setNewTransfer({...newTransfer,quantity:e.target.value}),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"From Base ID",value:newTransfer.fromBase,onChange:e=>setNewTransfer({...newTransfer,fromBase:e.target.value}),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"To Base ID",value:newTransfer.toBase,onChange:e=>setNewTransfer({...newTransfer,toBase:e.target.value}),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Transfer"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:transfers.map(t=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[t.asset.name," - ",t.quantity," from ",t.fromBase.name," to ",t.toBase.name]},t._id))})]});};export default Transfers;
